subcategories.name: For Best Friends
questions: What’s a moment in our friendship you’ll never forget?
What’s one thing you can tell me but not anyone else?
What’s the biggest way our friendship has changed you?
What inside joke of ours still makes you laugh instantly?
When did you first know we’d be close friends?
What’s something you admire about me but never said?
What’s your favorite adventure we’ve had together?
What’s one thing we do that every friendship should try?
What’s a risk you took because I encouraged you?
What’s your favorite memory of us being chaotic?
What’s something only I understand about you?
Which of my habits reminds you of me even when I’m not around?
What song instantly feels like “our friendship”?
When did we laugh the hardest together?
What’s the most meaningful conversation we’ve had?
What’s something we’ve been through that made our bond stronger?
If we lived together, what would be the funniest part?
What’s something we should do together at least once in life?
What do you think is the best part of having me as a friend?
What personality trait of mine balances you out?
What moment made you trust me fully?
What’s something you wish we did more often?
What’s one compliment you think I need to hear more?
What’s a dream you want us to achieve together one day?
What’s the weirdest thing we bonded over?
What’s a memory of us that always makes you smile?
What’s one tradition we should start as best friends?
If we wrote a book together, what would it be about?
What’s one thing you think we’ll joke about even when we’re old?
What do you think makes our friendship so rare?
